Savage climbs down from the roof of the ship.  Wrath and Crush back away a =
bit, and then go to a computer on the ship.  They find the markers on the s=
creen, and set of a strange laser explosion.  The lasers cut around the edg=
es, and then the whole wall gets vaporized by laser power.  Now, you could =
walk from the ship to the base.  The only thing left was for Arrow and Deem=
os to bring more bolts for connection.

Savage:  They better bring the bolt=
s soon.  But in the mean time.....

Savage offers Diesel and Razor the cant=
een of energin.
